bottom.text: Gain 2 retaliate for the next 6 melee attacks targeting you

top.text: Spend Earth to add 1 power and gain 1 xp

bottom.text: Create two single-hex obstacles in empty hexes adjacent to you
All adjacent allies and enemies suffer 1 damage

top.text: All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage
Add 1 target to your next four ranged Attack actions
Destroy one adjacent obstacle

bottom.text: Move and immobilize all enemies moved through

top.text: Target all adjacent enemies. Spend Earth to target all enemies up to two hexes away instead and gain 1 xp

bottom.text: Shield self and allies 2, all allies suffer 1 damage

top.text: Spend Earth to add Push 2 and gain 1 xp

bottom.text: All adjacent allies and enemies suffer 1 damage, move 4, then all adjacent allies and enemies suffer 1 damage. Spend Earth to make inflict 2 damage instead, and gain 1 xp

top.text: Target a hexagon of hexes within 2 hexes of you. Muddle all allies and enemies in the targeted area. Spend Earth to add 1 power and gain 1 xp.
Spend Earth to add immobilize and gain 1 xp
You may push the target into hexes containing obstacle, which destroys the obstacle, deals 2 damage to the to the target, and you gain 1xp

bottom.text: Add 1 power to all your ranged attacks this round

top.text: Target a triangle of hexes within 3 hexes of you. Gain 1 xp for each enemy targeted

bottom.text: Add 2 power to all your melee attacks this round
On your next 6 ranged Attacks: spend Air to add 2 range

top.text: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. Then attack all enemies adjacent to the destroyed obstacle.
Target a triangle of hexes within 3 hexes of you. Attack all enemies in the targeted area and then heal all allies in the targeted area.

bottom.text: Move 2, then heal all adjacent allies, then attack all adjacent enemies

top.text: Move one adjacent single-hex obstacle to an empty hex within Range 4, then target all enemies adjacent to the moved obstacle. Spend Earth to add 1 power and gain 1 xp.

bottom.text: Destroy all obstacles and disarm all traps moved through

top.text: Spend Earth to add 4 power and gain 2 xp
Create three single-hex obstacles in empty hexes within Range 4. All allies and enemies adjacnet to one or more of these obstacles suffer 2 damage.

bottom.text: The movement must be in a straight line

top.text: Move 1, then Attack 4
Kill one normal enemy within Range 4. Create one single-hex obstacle in the hex in which the enemy died.
Gain 1 xp for each enemy targeted

bottom.text: On your next four melee attacks when possible, destroy an adjacent obstacle to add 3 power

top.text: Gain 1 xp for each enemy targeted
Immobilize all allies and enemies in the targeted area. Spend Earth to add 2 power, and gain 2 xp.
Create one three-hex triangluar obstacle in empty hexas within Range 3. Target all enemies adjacent to the obstacles.
For each hex you cannot push the target because of a wall or obstacle, the target suggers 2 damage and you gain 1 xp.

bottom.text: Add 1 power to all your ranged attacks this round. Spend Earth to add 2 power instead and gain 1 xp.

top.text: Destroy all obstacles within Range 2. Spend Earth to use Range 3 and gain 1 xp. Then attack with power equal to twice the number of hexes the destroyed obstacles occupied.

bottom.text: The movement must end in a hex adjacent to an obstacle.

top.text: All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer damage equal to the damage the target suffered

bottom.text: All allies and enemies adjacent to any hexes you enter during the movement suffer 2 damage.

top.text: You may push the targets into hexes containing obstacles. In each case, the obstacle is destroyed, the target suffers 2 damage, and you gain 1 xp.

bottom.text: Attack 2 all adjacent enemies, move 5 jump, then attack 3 all adjacent enemies
